We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private WilliamsPercentR _wilr;
// In Initialize()
_wilr = WILR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_wilr.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Maximum", _wilr.Maximum);
    Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Minimum", _wilr.Minimum);
    Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Is Ready", _wilr.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Warm Up Period", _wilr.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Current", _wilr.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Name", _wilr.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Samples", _wilr.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.wilr = self.WILR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.wilr.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Maximum", self.wilr.Maximum);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Minimum", self.wilr.Minimum);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Is Ready", self.wilr.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Warm Up Period", self.wilr.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Current", self.wilr.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Name", self.wilr.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "WILR Samples", self.wilr.Samples);
}
